scripts.clean:
git reset && echo '/node_modules/' > .gitignore && git add .gitignore && git stash save --include-untracked --keep-index '`npm run clean` trash can' && git clean --force -d && git reset --hard && echo '
clean: Uncommitted and ignored files have been moved to gitâ€™s stash. To restore them run `git stash pop --quiet; git checkout .gitignore`.'
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: babel --loose es6.spread *.js module/*.js module/**/*.js --out-dir .es5 && node .es5/test.js | tap-spec
